Weighted LDA Models

Weighted_LDA.Rmd

Weighted LDA

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                   model            = "base",       # select the model
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##    Topic_1   Topic_2     Topic_3       Topic_4  Topic_5   Topic_6    Topic_7
## 1    shall   program       shall           act    state       act    section
## 2     loan secretary       state           use    court   section        act
## 3  federal     shall      person         state   action      year subsection
## 4  section    health      report       project    shall     u.s.c     united
## 5     make  research     section        system  section paragraph      state
## 6  patient    fiscal     general    government    class     amend      title
## 7   safety      year information         shall attorney  congress  paragraph
## 8   entity      fund  subsection       federal    crime       sec     insert
## 9   direct   provide     include administrator  federal    strike      child
## 10 product   service     provide         water   united       use      amend

Weighted LDA Covariates

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_cov <- keyATM_data_bills$cov
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
out <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,   # text input
                   number_of_topics = 7,             # number of topics
                   model            = "covariates",  # select the model
                   model_settings   = list(covariates_data = bills_cov),
                   options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1    Topic_2       Topic_3     Topic_4  Topic_5  Topic_6
## 1        shall     health         state        loan    state  program
## 2          use      state        agency     section    court    grant
## 3          act      child           act       shall    shall national
## 4  information    service administrator     federal   person research
## 5       report    program        school      direct   action    shall
## 6    secretary    include       federal    borrower   united     year
## 7       system       care         water        year      law     fund
## 8   government    section         shall        make  section   center
## 9      federal        act           sec      permit    class    carry
## 10        term subsection       coastal corporation attorney   fiscal
##       Topic_7
## 1     section
## 2         act
## 3  subsection
## 4   paragraph
## 5       amend
## 6      insert
## 7       title
## 8       shall
## 9    congress
## 10     follow

Weighted LDA Dynamic

library(keyATM)
data(keyATM_data_bills)
bills_dfm <- keyATM_data_bills$doc_dfm  # quanteda object
bills_time_index <- keyATM_data_bills$time_index
bills_time_index <- as.integer(bills_time_index - 100)
keyATM_docs <- keyATM_read(bills_dfm)
fitted <- weightedLDA(docs             = keyATM_docs,  # text input
                      number_of_topics = 7,            # number of topics
                      model            = "dynamic",    # select the model
                      model_settings   = list(time_index = bills_time_index, 
                                              num_states = 5),
                      options          = list(seed = 100))
top_words(out)
##        Topic_1    Topic_2       Topic_3     Topic_4  Topic_5  Topic_6
## 1        shall     health         state        loan    state  program
## 2          use      state        agency     section    court    grant
## 3          act      child           act       shall    shall national
## 4  information    service administrator     federal   person research
## 5       report    program        school      direct   action    shall
## 6    secretary    include       federal    borrower   united     year
## 7       system       care         water        year      law     fund
## 8   government    section         shall        make  section   center
## 9      federal        act           sec      permit    class    carry
## 10        term subsection       coastal corporation attorney   fiscal
##       Topic_7
## 1     section
## 2         act
## 3  subsection
## 4   paragraph
## 5       amend
## 6      insert
## 7       title
## 8       shall
## 9    congress
## 10     follow
